Class FTPPoolManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm.FTPPoolManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PoolManager<FTPConnection>

    public class FTPPoolManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PoolManager<FTPConnection>
    Manages FTP connection objects.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.
